Articles.Content: Is real world hydrazine monopropellant contemplated as RCS monopropellant ingame?
Can you word this question differently? It doesn't really make sense.

I'm assuming she/he means:

"Is Monopropellant in game Hydrazine?"

Which I think it is...

Yes, KSP's "monopropellant" is equivalent to hydrazine, which is mostly used for RCS systems. It is highly toxic and volatile stuff, which is why most spacecraft dump it before reaching the ground, so as to not endanger ground crews or to avoid catastrophic leaks during the landing.
Sorry, you finally understood my question. Thanks for the info.
